byline.original: By AL BAKER and RICK ROJAS

abstract: Two men open fire on crowd in Red Hook, Brooklyn, wounding five people, including pregnant woman whose fetus later dies; incident follows similar shooting in East New York; police say they believe violence is gang-related.
lead_paragraph: The woman’s fetus later died after the attack in Red Hook, in which two men opened fire on a crowd. Detectives said they believed the shooting was fueled by gang violence.

headline.main: Pregnant Woman and 4 Others Injured in Brooklyn Shooting
headline.print_headline: Pregnant Woman and 4 Others Are Shot; Fetus Dies in Brooklyn Attack, Police Say

snippet: The woman’s fetus later died after the attack in Red Hook, in which two men opened fire on a crowd. Detectives said they believed the shooting was fueled by gang violence.
